Scripts Glossary

disableHuskyInCI()
Creates a .huskyrc file that prevents Husky git hooks from running in CI environments. Located in disable-husky-in-ci.js.
ensureDocs(dirPath: string)
Ensures required HTML documentation files (CHANGELOG.html, AILESSONS.html, GLOSSARY.html) exist in the specified directory. Creates missing files with default templates. Located in ensure-docs.js.
  • Parameters:
    • dirPath: string - Directory path to check/create docs
  • Returns: Promise<void>
